entry.title: New release for pad.ws: v0.1.0
entry.content:
🚀 Real-time Collaboration is Here!

You can now work together with others on the same whiteboard in real-time, just like Figma or Miro.

✨ What's New

👥 Collaborate in Real-Time

  • See others' cursors moving around the canvas as they work
  • Changes sync instantly - no more refresh needed to see updates
  • Share your pads by right-clicking any tab and setting it to "Public"
  • Copy shareable URLs in the format: https://pad.ws/pad/your-pad-id

🔄 Important: Manual Update Required

Due to significant changes in how we store your data, you'll need to manually backup your pads before updating:

  1. Export your important pads using the export feature
  2. Reset your database when deploying this update
  3. Re-import your pads from the exported files (or just copy-paste your drawings)

We know this isn't ideal, but at this early stage it's the most reliable way to ensure everything works smoothly. Need help? Find us on Discord!

🛣️ What's Next

This is step 1 of 3 in our journey to build the ultimate collaborative whiteboard IDE:

  • ✅ Step 1: Real-time collaboration (this update!)
  • 🔄 Step 2: Shared cloud development environments
  • 🔮 Step 3: AI agent integration (starting with terminal-based tools)

Want to help build the future of collaborative development? Join us on Discord - we're always looking for passionate builders!

Built with ❤️ by @atyrode and @cyclotruc
